actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 17 of the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 in order to change the United States share of development costs for certain airports.

summary.text: Provides, under the Airport and Airway Development Act, that the United States share of allowable project costs payable on account of any approved airport development project may not exceed: (1) 50 percent for airports which enplane not less than 1 percent of the total annual passengers enplaned by air carriers certificated by the Civil Aeronautics Board; and (2) 75 percent for airports which enplane less than 1 percent of the total annual passengers enplaned by air carriers certificated by the Civil Aeronautics Board and for sponsors of general aviation or reliever airports.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 17 of the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 in order to change the United States share of development costs for certain airports.
